node.name: eva/3 Application Builder
node.shortdescription:
eva/3 Application Builder assumes responsibility for the design of forms and reports via an integrated GUI Builder, the execution of procedures and the
handling of diverse relational SQL databases through JDBC interface, e.g. Sybase
SQL Anywhere, Microsoft SQLServer 2000, Microsoft Access, MySQL, IBM
DB2, SAP MaxDB, Ingres, Firebird, Oracle, Parkway Microfocus, HSQLDB, PostgreSQL, JDataStore. High
performance database export and import functions are available, too.













Common features

o Basic Features

- SQL and dynamic SQL editor

- Color management editor

- User management editor

- Table editor

- Macro editor

- Command editor

- Referential integrity editor

- Beans administration

- Properties editor with muliple selection

- Database server view

- eva/3 references view

- Eclipse based help and documentation

- Context help

- Localization

- Project documentation

o Additional Features

- Form designer

- Report designer

- Auto-form generator

- Auto-report generator

- Auto-bean schema generator

o Supported Platforms

- Windows (JDK 1.4.x)

- Linux (JDK 1.4.x)


 Database features

o Basic Features

- Relational JDBC databases are supported

- Foreign keys

- Table and view editors

- Static integrated tables

- Indicies


o Additional Features

- Database converter

- Database Performance Analyzer

- CSV export

- High performance database access

- Search and filter functions

- Visual sql editor

- Print and preview functions

- Large data sets optimizations

- Import and export functions


 Form features

o Basic Features

- Quick form preview

- Cut / Copy / Paste / Delete functions

- Undo & Redo functions

- Modification of components order

o Additional Features

- Table elements represent data sources in forms

- Easy database integration

- Standard and user defined components

- Intelectual ComboBoxes

- Regular Expressions

- Variable table row height

- Striped tables with multirow cells


o Supported Layouts

- Null

- FlowLayout

- GridLayout

- BorderLayout

- GridBagLayout

- CardLayout

- BoxLayout


 Report features

o Basic features

- Cut / Copy / Paste / Delete functions

- Undo & Redo functions

- Visual modification of components order

- Zoom function

- Page format

- Variable report structure

- Report groups

- Previes/Printing reports

- Report export as pdf-file

o Additional Features

- Easy database integration

- BarCodes and 2DBarCodes

- Excel(r) export

- Advance standard and user defined components

- Regular expressions


o Layout of reports

- Page header

- Report header

- Detail area

- Report footer

- Page ending

- Page footer
node.body:
eva/3 Application Builder assumes responsibility for the design of forms and reports via an integrated GUI Builder, the execution of procedures and the
handling of diverse relational SQL databases through JDBC interface, e.g. Sybase
SQL Anywhere, Microsoft SQLServer 2000, Microsoft Access, MySQL, IBM
DB2, SAP MaxDB, Ingres, Firebird, Oracle, Parkway Microfocus, HSQLDB, PostgreSQL, JDataStore. High
performance database export and import functions are available, too.

- Page footer
